content:
[
  {
    "problem": "Teachers struggling to provide personalized feedback on assignments",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "A feedback automation tool that uses machine learning to provide personalized feedback to students based on their work",
    "content_solution": "An online course that teaches teachers how to provide effective personalized feedback to students",
    "competitors": ["GradeScope", "Turnitin", "Peergrade"],
    "differentiator": "Our tool uses machine learning to provide highly personalized feedback to students, while our course focuses on equipping teachers with the skills to provide personalized feedback effectively"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Freelance writers who struggle to personalize their content for different clients",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "A content personalization tool that adapts writing style, tone and vocabulary based on client preferences",
    "content_solution": "An online course that teaches freelance writers how to personalize their writing for different clients",
    "competitors": ["Write with the Best", "ProWritingAid", "Copyscape"],
    "differentiator": "Our tool uses client preferences to personalize content, while our course focuses on teaching writers how to personalize content for maximum impact"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Small business owners who struggle to personalize their marketing messages",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "A marketing personalization tool that adapts marketing messages to user preferences and behavior",
    "content_solution": "An online course that teaches small business owners how to personalize marketing messages for their target audience",
    "competitors": ["Sailthru", "Dynamic Yield", "Evergage"],
    "differentiator": "Our tool is specifically designed for small businesses, while our course focuses on practical tips and strategies for personalizing marketing messages"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Personal trainers who struggle to provide personalized fitness plans to clients",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "A fitness personalization app that adapts workout plans and nutrition advice based on user preferences and goals",
    "content_solution": "An online course that teaches personal trainers how to personalize fitness plans for their clients",
    "competitors": ["Trainerize", "MyFitnessPal", "Fitbit"],
    "differentiator": "Our app uses machine learning to provide highly personalized fitness plans, while our course focuses on equipping personal trainers with the skills to provide effective personalized fitness plans"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Managers who struggle to provide personalized performance feedback to employees",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "A performance feedback automation tool that uses machine learning to provide personalized feedback to employees based on their strengths and weaknesses",
    "content_solution": "An online course that teaches managers how to provide effective personalized performance feedback",
    "competitors": ["Lattice", "15Five", "Culture Amp"],
    "differentiator": "Our tool uses machine learning to provide highly personalized feedback, while our course focuses on equipping managers with the skills to provide personalized feedback effectively"
  },
  {
    "problem": "E-commerce business owners who struggle to personalize the online shopping experience for customers",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "A website personalization tool that adapts the online shopping experience to user preferences and behavior",
    "content_solution": "An online course that teaches e-commerce business owners how to personalize the online shopping experience for their customers",
    "competitors": ["Dynamic Yield", "Optimizely", "Monetate"],
    "differentiator": "Our tool is specifically designed for small and medium-sized e-commerce businesses, while our course focuses on practical tips and strategies for personalizing the online shopping experience"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Language learners who struggle to personalize their language study plans",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "A language learning personalization app that adapts study plans and exercises based on user preferences and needs",
    "content_solution": "An online course that teaches language learners how to personalize their study plans for maximum effectiveness",
    "competitors": ["Duolingo", "Babbel", "Rosetta Stone"],
    "differentiator": "Our app uses machine learning to provide highly personalized language study plans, while our course focuses on equipping language learners with the skills to personalize their study plans effectively"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Financial advisors who struggle to personalize their investment advice for clients",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 5,
    "no_code_solution": "A financial advice personalization tool that uses machine learning to provide personalized investment advice based on client preferences and risk tolerance",
    "content_solution": "An online course that teaches financial advisors how to provide effective personalized investment advice",
    "competitors": ["Salesforce Financial Services Cloud", "Orion Advisor", "Envestnet"],
    "differentiator": "Our tool uses machine learning to provide highly personalized investment advice, while our course focuses on equipping financial advisors with the skills to provide personalized investment advice effectively"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Job seekers who struggle to personalize their resumes and cover letters for different job applications",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "A resume and cover letter personalization tool that adapts content and format based on job requirements",
    "content_solution": "An online course that teaches job seekers how to personalize their resumes and cover letters for maximum effectiveness",
    "competitors": ["Resume-Now", "MyPerfectResume", "Zety"],
    "differentiator": "Our tool uses job requirements to personalize resumes and cover letters, while our course focuses on teaching job seekers how to personalize for maximum impact"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Art collectors who struggle to personalize their art collections for their tastes and preferences",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "An art personalization tool that suggests art pieces based on user tastes and preferences",
    "content_solution": "An online course that teaches art collectors how to personalize their art collections for maximum enjoyment",
    "competitors": ["ArtBinder", "Artful", "Artsy"],
    "differentiator": "Our tool uses machine learning to suggest highly personalized art pieces, while our course focuses on practical tips and strategies for personalizing art collections"
  }
